body.p:
Louisville November 1 1862
To his Excellency the Governor

In answer to yours of the 30 ult in regard to the case of Stevens convicted of murder at this Court I would state that in case of a verdict of guilty on an indictment for murder, the accused will be hung unless reprieved by the Governor -- I sent you a copy of such verdict, the sentence has not yet been pronounced

Resply
James P Chambers
